sqls.test: select corr(i.close,n.LJJZ) as correlationindex,substring_index(n.rowkey,"_",1) from index i inner join netval n on substr(i.rowkey,instr(i.rowkey,"_")+1)=substr(n.rowkey,instr(n.rowkey,"_")+1) group by substring_index(n.rowkey,"_",1) order by crr(i.close,n.LJJZ) desc
sqls.test2:
select substr(n.rowkey,instr(n.rowkey,"_")+1) from netval n
where substring_index(i.rowkey,"_",1)='SH000300' and substring_index(n.rowkey,"_",1)='161604'
